Save Act Verifier

This tool summarizes documentation requirements proposed under the SAVE Act.
It does not collect or store any personal data. It is an informational reference tool only.

Why This Matters

The SAVE Act (H.R.8281) has passed the House and is currently in the Senate. This tool reflects the requirements as they are written in the proposed law, helping you verify if you have the correct documents ready for 2026.

Requirements vary by state. Select yours to begin checking your eligibility.

US Civic Action

Independent. Non-partisan.

We are 100% ad-free and tracking-free. Running our servers relies entirely on user support.
